  • **Pitched Battle GHB 2021** 2,000 (Destruction - Ogor Mawtribes) [1,980pts]

      • Core Battalion: Battle Regiment

        Categories: Core Battalion

        Battalion Abilities: Unified, Battalion Organisation: Core Battalion: Battle Regiment


        Battalion Abilities Battalion Ability Details Ref
        Unified One-drop Deployment (see 26.2.1).
        Battalion Organisation Required Ref
        Core Battalion: Battle Regiment 1 Commander
        0-2 Sub-commanders
        2-5 Troops
        0-1 Monster or Artillery

    • Leader [1,130pts]

      • Butcher [135pts]

        Selections: 6. Greasy Deluge, Battle Regiment - 0-2 Sub-Commander, Gulping Bite, Levitate, Tenderiser

        Categories: Leader, HERO, DESTRUCTION, OGOR, GUTBUSTERS, OGOR MAWTRIBES, WIZARD, BUTCHER, 9 or less wounds Leader

        Magic: Butcher, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Greasy Deluge, Levitate, Mystic Shield, Voracious Maw, Unit: Butcher, Unit Abilities: Bloodgruel, Fly, Weapon: Gulping Bite, Tenderiser


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Butcher 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Voracious Maw
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Greasy Deluge 718"If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that unit until the start of your next hero phase. Destruction Battletome: Ogor Mawtribes
        Levitate 818"Pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. That unit can fly until your next hero phase.
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Voracious Maw 718"If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. After resolving any damage, roll a dice. On a 1, 2 or 3, the maw is said to be satisfied and the spell ends. On a 4+, the target unit suffers D3 additional mortal wounds. Keep repeating this process until the maw is satisfied or the target unit is destroyed.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Butcher 6"785+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bloodgruel Roll a dice each time a this model successfully casts or unbinds a spell, after the effects of the spell have been resolved. On a 2+, you can heal 1 wound allocated to this model. On a 1, this model suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Fly This unit can fly.

      • Kragnos, The End of Empires [695pts]

        Selections: Hooves of Wrack and Ruin, The Dread Mace, Tuskbreaker

        Categories: Leader, Behemoth, MONSTER, HERO

        Kragnos Wound Track: Wounds1, Wounds2, Wounds3, Wounds4, Unit: Kragnos, The End of Empires, Unit Abilities: Bellow of Rage, Destroyer of the Draconith Empire, Icon of Destruction, Rampaging Destruction, The Shield Inviolate, Warmaster, Weapon: Hooves of Wrack and Ruin, The Dread Mace, Tuskbreaker


        Kragnos Wound Track Wounds SufferedMoveHooves of Wrack and RuinBellow of Rage Ref
        Wounds1 0-910"65+
        Wounds2 10-129"54+
        Wounds3 13-158"43+
        Wounds4 16+7"32+
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Kragnos, The End of Empires *18102+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bellow of Rage At the end of any phase, if any wounds were allocated to this model in that phase and not negated, roll a dice for each other unit and each defensible terrain feature within 6" of this model. If the roll is equal to or greater than the Bellow of Rage value shown on this model's damage table, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds or that defensible terrain feature is demolished.
        Destroyer of the Draconith Empire You can re-roll charge rolls and hit rolls for this model while it is within 12" of any enemy STARDRAKES, DRAKES, DRACOTHS or DRACOLINES
        Icon of Destruction Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of friendly DESTRUCTION units wholly within 12" of this model.
        Rampaging Destruction After this model makes a charge move, you can either roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 1" of this model or you can pick 1 enemy MONSTER within 1" of this model and roll 2D6.

        If you roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this model, on a 2+ that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

        If you pick 1 enemy MONSTER within 1" of this model and roll 2D6, on a 7, nothing happens. On any other roll, that MONSTER suffers a number of mortal wounds equal to the score of the dice used for the 2D6 roll multiplied together. For example, a 2D6 roll of 2 and 6 would inflict 12 mortal wounds (2 x 6 = 12)
        The Shield Inviolate Each time this model is affected by a spell or an endless spell ability, you can roll 3D6. If the roll is greater than the casting value of that spell or endless spell, ignore the effects of that spell or that endless spell ability on this model.
        Warmaster This unit can be included in an Orruk Warclans, Gloomspite Gitz, Ogor Mawtribes or Sons of Behemat army. If it is, it is treated as a general even if it is not the model picked to be the army’s general, and you can still use the army’s allegiance abilities even if this unit is not from the army’s faction.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Hooves of Wrack and Ruin Melee1"*3+2+-12
        The Dread Mace Melee3"63+2+-34
        Tuskbreaker Melee1"33+2+-2D3

      • Slaughtermaster [140pts]

        Selections: 2. Blood Feast, 3. Ribcracker, Battle Regiment - 0-2 Sub-Commander, Gulping Bite, Motley Assortment of Weapons, Stump Blades

        Categories: Leader, HERO, DESTRUCTION, OGOR, GUTBUSTERS, OGOR MAWTRIBES, WIZARD, BUTCHER, SLAUGHTERMASTER, 9 or less wounds Leader

        Magic: Slaughtermaster, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Blood Feast, Mystic Shield, Ribcracker, Rockchomper, Unit: Slaughtermaster, Unit Abilities: Bloodgruel, Great Cauldron, Weapon: Gulping Bite, Motley Assortment of Weapons, Stump Blades


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Slaughtermaster 1/1Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Rockchomper
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Blood Feast 718"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly OGOR unit that is not a MONSTER and that is wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit’s melee weapons until the start of your next hero phase. Destruction Battletome: Ogor Mawtribes
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.
        Ribcracker 718"If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Subtract 1 from save rolls for attacks that target that unit until the start of your next hero phase. Destruction Battletome: Ogor Mawtribes
        Rockchomper 518"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit of OGOR GLUTTONS wholly within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Until the start of your next hero phase, if the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with that unit’s Gulping Bite is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage and that unit can heal 1 wound allocated to it.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Slaughtermaster 6"785+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bloodgruel Roll a dice each time a this model successfully casts or unbinds a spell, after the effects of the spell have been resolved. On a 2+, you can heal 1 wound allocated to this model. On a 1, this model suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Great Cauldron In your hero phase, you can say that this model will reach into its cauldron and feast on the contents. If you do so, roll a dice and consult the table below.

        D6 Effect
        1 Bad Meat: This model suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        2 Troggoth Guts: You can heal D3 wounds allocated to this model. In addition, you can heal 1 wound allocated to each friendly OGOR unit wholly within 12" of this model.
        3-4 Spinemarrow: Pick a friendly OGOR unit wholly within 12" of this model. Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by that unit until the start of your next hero phase.
        5-6 Bonecrusher: Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 6" of this model. On a 4+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

      • Tyrant [160pts]

        Selections: 0. Nice Drop of the Red Stuff!, 0. Splatter-cleaver, Battle Regiment - 1 Commander, Beastskewer Glaive, General, Gulping Bite, Ogor Pistols, Thundermace

        Categories: Leader, HERO, DESTRUCTION, OGOR, TYRANT, GUTBUSTERS, OGOR MAWTRIBES, 9 or less wounds Leader, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Splatter-cleaver, Command Abilities: Bully of the First Degree, Command Trait: Nice Drop of the Red Stuff!, Unit: Tyrant, Unit Abilities: Beastskewer Glaive, Big Name, Thundermace, Weapon: Beastskewer Glaive, Gulping Bite, Ogor Pistols, Thundermace


        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Splatter-cleaver Pick 1 of the bearer’s melee weapons. At the end of the combat phase, if any wounds inflicted by that weapon in that phase were allocated to an enemy model and not negated, you can heal D3 wounds allocated to each friendly BLOODGULLET OGOR unit wholly within 12" of the bearer (roll separately for each unit). Destruction Battletome: Ogor Mawtribes
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Bully of the First Degree You can use this command ability in your hero phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly GUTBUSTERS unit within 3" of a friendly model with this command ability. That unit suffers D3 mortal wounds, but you do not have to take battleshock tests for that unit for the rest of the battle.
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Nice Drop of the Red Stuff! Friendly units that start a pile-in move wholly within 12" of this general can move an extra 3" when they pile in. Destruction Battletome: Ogor Mawtribes
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Tyrant 6"884+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Beastskewer Glaive If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Beastskewer Glaive that targets a HERO or MONSTER is 6, the Beastskewer Glaive has a Damage characteristic of D6 instead of D3 for that attack.
        Big Name When you select this unit to be part of your army, you can choose or roll one of the following big names to apply to this model. Record this information on a piece of paper.
        Thundermace If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Thundermace is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound in addition to any normal damage. If the target unit has more than 3 models, on an unmodified 6, that attack inflicts D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Beastskewer Glaive Melee3"23+3+-1D3
        Gulping Bite Melee1"13+3+-1
        Ogor Pistols Missile12"24+3+-1D3
        Thundermace Melee1"33+3+-23

    • Battleline [850pts]

      • Ironguts [490pts]

        Selections: 8 Ironguts [245pts], Battle Regiment - 2-5 Troops, Bellower, Gulping Bite, Mighty Bashing Weapon, Reinforced [245pts], Rune Maw Bearer

        Categories: DESTRUCTION, OGOR MAWTRIBES, OGOR, GUTBUSTERS, Battleline, Reinforced

        Unit: Ironguts, Unit Abilities: Bellower, Down to the Ironguts, Gutlord, Rune Maw Bearer, Weapon: Gulping Bite, Mighty Bashing Weapon


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Ironguts 6"474+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Bellower 1 in every 4 models in this unit can be a Bellower. Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 6" of any Bellowers.
        Down to the Ironguts Once per battle, in your hero phase, if at least 1 OGOR model from your army has fled the battle, you can use this ability. If you do so, you can re-roll hit, wound and save rolls of 1 for this unit until your next hero phase.
        Gutlord 1 model in this unit can be a Gutlord. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Mighty Bashing Weapon.
        Rune Maw Bearer 1 in every 4 models in this unit can be a Rune Maw Bearer. If an enemy unit fails a battleshock test within 6" of any Rune Maw Bearers, you can roll a dice. On a 6, add D3 to the number of models that flee.
        In addition, each time a unit with any Rune Maw Bearers is affected by a spell or endless spell, you can roll a dice. If you do so, on a 6, ignore the effects of that spell or endless spell on that unit.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Gulping Bite Melee1"13+3+-1
        Mighty Bashing Weapon Melee2"33+3+-13

        Thunderous Blasts of Hot Metal This unit’s Leadbelcher Guns have an Attacks characteristic of D6 instead of D3 if this unit did not make a move in the same turn.

    • Scenery

      • Great Mawpot

        Categories: Scenery

        Unit Abilities: Battlebroth, IMPASSABLE, SET-UP, Throw ’Em In, Vessel of the Gulping God


        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Battlebroth A Great Mawpot is either full or empty. At the start of the battle, it is full. In your hero phase, 1 friendly OGOR HERO within 6" of a full Great Mawpot in your army can spend all of that Great Mawpot’s magic. If they do so, you can heal D3 wounds allocated to each friendly OGOR unit wholly within 36"
        of that Great Mawpot (roll separately for each unit). Once all of the Great Mawpot’s magic has been spent, it is empty.
        IMPASSABLE You cannot move models over this terrain feature unless it can fly, and you cannot move a model onto this terrain feature or set up a model on this terrain feature (even if it can fly).
        SET-UP After territories are determined, you can set up this faction terrain feature wholly within your territory and more than 3" from all objectives and other terrain features. If both players can set up faction terrain features at the same time, they must roll off and the winner chooses who sets up their faction terrain features first.
        Throw ’Em In If an enemy model is slain within 6" of an empty GREAT MAWPOT from your army, it becomes full.
        Vessel of the Gulping God Add 1 to casting, unbinding or dispelling rolls for OGOR WIZARDS while they are within 1" of this terrain feature.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Ogor Mawtribes

          Selections: Bloodgullet Mawtribe

          Battle Trait: Everwinter Prayers, Grasp of the Everwinter, Heralds of the Gulping God, Mawtribes, Might Makes Right, Ravenous Brutes, Trampling Charge, Command Abilities: Bloodbath


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Everwinter Prayers Each BEASTCLAW RAIDERS PRIEST in an Ogor Mawtribes army knows 1 Everwinter prayer from the Manifestations of the Eternal Snowstorm table (pg 77) in addition to any other prayers they know.

        In your hero phase, each friendly BEASTCLAW RAIDERS PRIEST that knows any Everwinter prayers can chant 1 Everwinter prayer. If they do so, make a prayer roll by rolling a dice.

        Each Everwinter prayer has a chanting value. If the prayer roll is equal to or greater than the chanting value of the Everwinter prayer, the prayer is answered.

        Each Everwinter prayer can only be attempted once per turn, regardless of how many BEASTCLAW RAIDERS PRIESTS know that Everwinter prayer.
        Grasp of the Everwinter At the start of your hero phase, roll 1 dice for each enemy unit within 3" of any friendly BEASTCLAW RAIDERS units. If the roll is equal to or less than the number of the current battle round, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Heralds of the Gulping God BLOODGULLET BUTCHERS know 1 extra spell from the Lore of Gutmagic (pg 76). In addition, friendly BLOODGULLET BUTCHERS can attempt to cast 1 extra spell in your hero phase.
        Mawtribes If your army is a Ogor Mawtribes army, you can give it a Mawtribe keyword from the list below. All OGOR MAWTRIBES units in your army gain that keyword, and you can use the extra abilities listed for that Mawtribe on the page indicated.

        • MEATFIST (pg 82)
        • BLOODGULLET (pg 83)
        • UNDERGUTS (pg 84)
        • BOULDERHEAD (pg 85)
        • THUNDERBELLIES (pg 86)
        • WINTERBITE (pg 87)

        If a model already has a Mawtribe keyword on its warscroll, it cannot gain another one. This does not preclude you from including the unit in your army.
        Might Makes Right When determining control of an objective, each OGOR counts as 2 models instead of 1, and each OGOR MONSTER counts as 10 models instead of 1.
        Ravenous Brutes If an OGOR unit is more than 3" from any enemy units, it is hungry. If an OGOR unit is within 3" of any enemy units, it is eating. Add 2" to the Move characteristic of a unit that is hungry. Add 2 to the Bravery characteristic of a unit that is eating.
        Trampling Charge After an OGOR or RHINOX unit makes a charge move, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 1" of this unit and roll a number of dice equal to the unmodified charge roll for that charge move. Add 2 to each roll if the OGOR unit that made the charge move has 8 or more models or is a MONSTER. For each 6+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Bloodbath You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly BLOODGULLET BUTCHER. Until the end of that phase, you can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly BLOODGULLET OGOR GLUTTONS units that are wholly within 12" of that BLOODGULLET BUTCHER.

    • Game Options

      • Game Type

        Selections: 2000 Points - Battlehost

        Categories: Game Options, Battlehost

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Hold the Line

        Categories: Game Options, Grand Strategy

        Grand Strategy: Hold the Line


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Hold the Line When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there are any Battleline units from your starting army on the battlefield.
